Package org.knime.base.data.filter.column

Contains column filter for DataTable objects which includes or excludes a certain number of columns from a given data table.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CloseableFilterColumnRowIterator
    Filter column row iterator needed to wrap the filter column's original row iterator.
    FilterColumnRow
    Filter DataRow which extracts particular cells (columns) from an underlying row.
    FilterColumnRowInput
    A RowInput that wraps another input and hides/re-orders columns according to an int[].
    FilterColumnRowIterator
    Filter column row iterator needed to wrap the filter column's original row iterator.
    FilterColumnTable
    This DataTable filters (includes or excludes) a specified number of columns from a given table by just wrapping the underlying data table.

Package org.knime.base.data.filter.column Description

Contains column filter for DataTable objects which includes or excludes a certain number of columns from a given data table. This table's columns are just wrapped into a new table called FilterColumnTable. Furthermore, the FilterColumnRow is internally used to extract the obmitted cells (columns) from each row.
